languages.text:
"Крепкой бронею встав на пути у беды,
Стойко Ульфар принимал град ударов.
Раны не чуя, разил он жестоких врагов
Оберегая союзни{mf|ка|цу} от скорой смерти".

"Like stout armour
in trouble's path standing,
Ulfar boldly accepted
the hail of blows.
Numb to his wounds,
the cruel foes he slew,
his ally's looming death forestalling."
languages.original_text:
"Крепкой бронею встав на пути у беды,
Стойко Ульфар принимал град ударов.
Раны не чуя, разил он жестоких врагов
Оберегая союзни{mf|ка|цу} от скорой смерти".

languages.text:
「難関の行く手を阻む
頑丈な鎧のように
ウルファーは果敢に
打撃の雨を受け止めた。
傷の痛みに慣れ
残酷な敵を倒すなか
盟友たちの死が迫っていた」
languages.original_text:
"Like stout armour
in trouble's path standing,
Ulfar boldly accepted
the hail of blows.
Numb to his wounds,
the cruel foes he slew,
his ally's looming death forestalling."

traits.locale_text:
「難関の行く手を阻む
頑丈な鎧のように
ウルファーは果敢に
打撃の雨を受け止めた。
傷の痛みに慣れ
残酷な敵を倒すなか
盟友たちの死が迫っていた」

languages.text:
“乌尔法如同坚不可摧屏障，
傲然屹立，
挡住无数冰雹般落下的，
凶猛进攻。
他对伤口早已麻木，
只是手刃了凶残的敌人，
阻止盟友落入死亡的命运。”
languages.original_text:
"Like stout armour
in trouble's path standing,
Ulfar boldly accepted
the hail of blows.
Numb to his wounds,
the cruel foes he slew,
his ally's looming death forestalling."

他对伤口早已麻木，
只是手刃了凶残的敌人，
阻止盟友落入死亡的命运。”

languages.text:
« Comme une armure robuste
Ulfar accepta courageusement
la grêle de coups qui s'abattit sur lui.
Ignorant ses blessures,
ses cruels ennemis il tua,
détournant de son {mf|allié|alliée}
l'ombre d'une mort imminente. »
languages.original_text:
"Like stout armour
in trouble's path standing,
Ulfar boldly accepted
the hail of blows.
Numb to his wounds,
the cruel foes he slew,
his ally's looming death forestalling."

l'ombre d'une mort imminente. »

languages.text:
«Como recia armadura
que soporta todo castigo,
Ulfar aceptó con arrojo
el interminable asalto ofensivo.
Impasible ante el dolor,
con sus crueles enemigos acabó,
salvando la vida a su camarada».
languages.original_text:
"Like stout armour
in trouble's path standing,
Ulfar boldly accepted
the hail of blows.
Numb to his wounds,
the cruel foes he slew,
his ally's looming death forestalling."

Impasible ante el dolor,

salvando la vida a su camarada».

languages.text:
"Wie eine stabile Rüstung,
die sich dem Ärger in den Weg stellt,
nahm Ulfar den Hagel der Hiebe
kühn hin.
Seine Wunden nicht spürend
streckte die grausamen Feinde er nieder,
den drohenden Tod seines Verbündeten verhindernd."
languages.original_text:
"Like stout armour
in trouble's path standing,
Ulfar boldly accepted
the hail of blows.
Numb to his wounds,
the cruel foes he slew,
his ally's looming death forestalling."

languages.text:
"Kötülüğün yolunda duran
kuvvetli bir zırh gibi
Ulfar cesurca kabullendi
yumruk yağmurunu.
Yaralarını umursamadan
acımasız düşmanları katletti.
Engel oldu müttefikinin yaklaşan ölümüne."

"Like stout armour
